feed.title: Juan de Fuca Strait - Marine Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: STRONG WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Juan de Fuca Strait - east entrance
Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Juan de Fuca Strait - east entrance
entry.summary:
Wind northeasterly 5 to 15 knots becoming light this afternoon then increasing to west 20 to 25 Wednesday morning. Wind increasing to west 25 to 30 Wednesday evening. Chance of showers beginning early this evening changing to rain near midnight then to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - Juan de Fuca Strait - east entrance
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind westerly 10 to 20 knots increasing to westerly 20 to 30 in the afternoon.
Friday: Wind westerly 10 to 15 knots increasing to westerly 15 to 25 late in the day.
Saturday: Wind light increasing to westerly 10 to 20 knots late in the day.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Juan de Fuca Strait - west entrance
entry.summary:
Wind east 5 to 15 knots becoming west 10 to 15 late overnight. Wind west 10 to 15 Wednesday. Chance of showers changing to rain late this evening then to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - Juan de Fuca Strait - west entrance
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind westerly 10 to 20 knots increasing to westerly 20 to 30 in the afternoon.

entry.title: STRONG WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Juan de Fuca Strait - central strait
Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Juan de Fuca Strait - central strait
entry.summary:
Wind easterly 5 to 15 knots becoming light this afternoon then increasing to west 10 to 15 late overnight. Wind increasing to west 15 to 25 Wednesday morning. Chance of showers beginning early this evening changing to rain near midnight then to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018
